document.heading: Insurance Coverage for Emergency Department HIV Testing Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-316, the “Insurance Coverage for Emergency Department HIV Testing Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-487 which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2008, and December 2, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-620 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-316 became effective on March 21, 2009.
